name: Ken Ken Revolution
description:
A hypnotizing  and relaxing rhythm game Made for Kenney Jam 2021

Use the arrow keys or WASD and time your presses to the beat!  More precision and bigger combos = bigger score!

Add a high score to show off when you're done!

Known bugs: 

  • high score button on main menu doesn't work, you'll have to complete a level to see the high scores.
  • Song endings aren't timed super great
  • Combo is incorrectly calculated for the high score boards!  oh well!

Music credits:

https://opengameart.org/content/puzzle-tune-1
https://opengameart.org/content/dissonant-waltz
